text: Saint Francis Xavier, S.J. (born Francisco de Jasso y Azpilicueta, 7 April 15063 December 1552) was a Spanish Jesuit. He was made a saint by the Catholic church. He is known for his travels to Asia, including Goa and Japan. ==Other websites== *St. Francis Xavier at the Catholic Encyclopedia Category:1506 births Category:1552 deaths Category:Christian saints Category:Jesuits Category:Spanish Roman Catholics
title: Francis Xavier
